H0.text: what type of artwork was created in the safavid empire. Carpet

H1.text: what type of artwork was created in the safavid empire. Miniature Painting

H2.text: what type of artwork was created in the safavid empire. Ceramic

H3.text: what type of artwork was created in the safavid empire. book

A4.text: The rapid development of the carpet industry in the Persian Empire during the Safavid period seems to be due to the sovereigns' taste for this art form.

A5.text: It was a high point for Persian miniatures, architecture and also included ceramics, metal, glass, and gardens.
